emuInput.TitMainTitle: Prospective University of Pittsburgh football players no. 78 Jimmy Jones and no. 31 Eric Crabtree with coach Louis "Bimbo" Cecconi in locker room
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 4, 1963, pg. 24, reads: "Two New Panthers - Jimmy Jones (left), 250-pound tackle from Easton (Pa.) High School, and Eric Crabtree, from Monessen (Pa.) High School, are seen chatting with Bimbo Cecconi, a University of Pittsburgh coaching staff member [illegible] plays and assignments, last week, just before both distinguished themselved in the annual intra-squad game.  The Panthers' staff expect great things from both men.  (see story on page 22.) - Harris Photo."
